name: Funguy Flyby
description:
Hello and welcome on the game page of my very first game.

I have just started trying to program with the intention of making games, so i know it is a very simple game, with much improvent in mind. So for now i just uploaded it for myself and anyone who would try my game.

For now it is a very simple platformer, with a lot of inspiration from doodle jump. I aim to refine this game first with some more simple mechanics, enemies etc.

If you have any fun ideas that i could add so i can improve my programming skills they are appreciated.

So for now enjoy this very simple endless hell of jumping on platforms and dodging a bird on the way.
